title: WTF is going on
body: Played a game of ARAM game finishes start up another, cannot connect, restart pc, same thing, keeps saying a firewall may be blocking it, mate of mine jumps on team viewer who works with networking n shit, says its nothing to do with the firewall, same thing happened a few days ago,  its just been since last patch, every patch one of my mates seems to have issues with the game, WTF is going on

replies.body: What ISP are you with, and what OS are you on?
Same thing happening to me. Except mine keeps giving me an ‚ÄùUnknown Error" and I even get it with my firewall off.
